alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 4:38AM EST until February 19 at 8:18PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding along Irondequoit Creek caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of western New York, including the following county, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding will continue today along Irondequoit Creek. High water will inundate Ellison Park, Powder Mills Park, and other low lying areas along the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 435 AM EST, Excessive runoff from snowmelt and heavy rain on Thursday will continue to produce flooding today along Irondequoit Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rochester, Irondequoit, East Rochester, Brighton, Penfield and Pittsford. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
